title: Shorten Your URLs Easily.
subtitle: QuickShort is the easiest way to shorten URLs and track analytics for your website.
home-title: Shorten, Simplify and Track your URLs like a Pro.
home-subtitle: I love the simplicity and power of ShortMaster, it‚Äôs my go-to URL shortener.
home-testimony: Shorten your URLs with ShortMaster and get detailed analytics on clicks, country, and city.
home-section2-subtitle: With ShortMaster, you can shorten any long URL into a shorter one without any hassle. Simply paste the original link and get the shortened URL instantly.
home-section3-subtitle: ShortMaster provides a powerful dashboard that allows you to monitor your short URLs in real-time. You can view clicks, IP addresses, country, city, and other data on a single platform.
home-section4-subtitle: ShortMaster provides detailed analytics on your short URLs. You can track clicks over time, understand the user behavior and improve the performance of your site.
home-section5-title: The analytics is a game changer, I now know where my traffic is coming from.
authorDescription: I create various web applications, mainly fullstack, and I build with Sveltekit
